item.title: Bayesian A/B Testing
item.description: During my time as a Data Scientist at Andela, I had the opportunity to explore the realm of Bayesian A/B testing, an approach renowned for its robust performance in small sample sizes. Like many others, my introduction to experimentation was through Frequentist A/B testing. As I familiarized myself with concepts like p-values and statistical power, it took some time for me to streamline the bayesian framework of conducting experiments. In this article, I aim to guide you through the essential process of Bayesian A/B testing using an example along with some practical codes.
